articles.title: Invasive strep A is on the rise and affecting kids in unusual ways - The Washington Post
articles.description: Rare bacterial infections, such as invasive strep A, are popping up around the United States and Europe, with unusual effects for children.
articles.content:

articles.title: Vega-C rocket lost shortly after lift-off in French Guiana - Macau Business
articles.description: International, MNA | The European light launcher rocket Vega-C was lost shortly after lift-off from French Guiana on Tuesday with two Airbus satellites on board, the company behind the launch said.
articles.content:
The European light launcher rocket Vega-C was lost shortly after lift-off from French Guiana on Tuesday with two Airbus satellites on board, the company behind the launch said.

articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: Europe's Vega C rocket fails on 2nd-ever mission, 2 satellites lost - Space.com
articles.description: The Vega C was carrying two spacecraft for Airbus' Pléiades Neo Earth-imaging constellation.
articles.content:
The second mission of Europe's new Vega C rocket did not go according to plan.
The medium-lift Vega C lifted off from Europe's Spaceport in Kourou, French Guiana on Tuesday (Dec. 20) at 8:47 p.m. ES… [+3422 chars]
